2. Check the current configuration (pom.xml or build.gradle)
3. Update the Java version configuration

5. Fix any compatibility issues that arise
6. Ensure `mvn clean verify` passes with JDK 17

New string: 		<dependency>
			<groupId>com.mercateo</groupId>
			<artifactId>reflection</artifactId>
			<version>2.0.0</version>
		</dependency>
		<!-- JAXB API - removed from Java 9+ -->
		<dependency>
			<groupId>jakarta.xml.bind</groupId>
			<artifactId>jakarta.xml.bind-api</artifactId>
			<version>3.0.1</version>
		</dependency>
		<dependency>
			<groupId>org.glassfish.jaxb</groupId>
			<artifactId>jaxb-runtime</artifactId>
			<version>3.0.2</version>
			<scope>runtime</scope>
		</dependency>
